page.title: 13New House Farm.
page.content: The oldest part of the house is 300 years old. It used to be called{Lings {Farm}but the name was changed 145 years ago. Some where about this time an extension was added, and new windows were put in. These windows came from{Colchester Barracks.}There's a kind of courtyard surrounded by three derelict barns, 1 a cow shed, for the cows to go in, in winter,and 1 for them to go in, in summer.There used to be a second courtyard but there's only a derelict pig barn left of that.The house is no longer a real farm house as the land around it is farmed by someone else, and Mr. Catchesides, who lives there now with his family, is not a farmer.In the fields around Barley, hay and Oil Seed Rape are grown.
